name: Water Otter
description:
Even in the most terrible times, do not despair, sometimes you just need a little... FAITH! 

You are a Water God, and you have to save from drought and bring prosperity to a tribe of harmless otters, and create an oasis in the middle of an endless desert. But not everything is so simple, in the way of your tribe there are evil Fire Otters who reject your divinity (they even call you a watering bowl god) and this challenge will not be easy, because you are a new weak god. 

Your tribe believes in you, don't let them down!
